entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Lucky Lake

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:38 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
